thread.title: Jesy Nelson becomes Human Barbie after flaunting VERY different look in flattering Instagram photo - so what has changed?
thread.title_full: Jesy Nelson becomes Human Barbie after flaunting VERY different look in flattering Instagram photo - so what has changed?

author: Lara Martin
title: Jesy Nelson becomes Human Barbie after flaunting VERY different look in flattering Instagram photo - so what has changed?
text:
Get celebs   Thank you for subscribing!   
Jesy Nelson ’s fans can’t get over how incredible she looks in a jaw-dropping new photo, flaunting a very svelte figure while over in America. 
The Little Mix singer is appearing on US breakfast show Today and took to Instagram to share a super flattering photo taken backstage at the TV studio. 
Jesy flaunted a rock hard stomach and slim legs as she struck a seriously fierce pose that had fans taking to Instagram in their droves to sing her praises. Jesy's jaw-dropping photo on Instagram (Photo: Instagram) Jesy pictured on stage in the US this week (Photo: Splash News) 
It had loyal Mixers comparing Jesy, 25, to a Barbie Doll, branding her the queen of social media and basically saying she had totally slated the whole fashion thing. 
One wrote: “You always looked great Jesy but this is on another level ” 
A second joked: “I'm logging off of social media today! Jesy just killed me! This should be illegal for her to slay me like this!” 
Plenty of fans on Instagram compared Jesy to a Barbie Doll, branding her an actual Human Barbie and lavishing her with compliments about every aspect of her look. 
Another simply said: “You’re such a goddess.” 
Jesy was certainly looking amazing and very different from last week, when she attended the BRIT Awards with Little Mix and walked home with the British Single prize for Shout Out To My Ex. Read More Jesy on stage this week (Photo: Splash News) Jesy (left) on the red carpet at the BRITs (Photo: Rex Features) At the BRITs last Wednesday night (Photo: Instagram/ @jesynelson) Read More Little Mix promise to NEVER split up after enjoying a “few bevvies” at the BRIT Awards 
So, what changed in just a week? 
Aside from her fierce pose and killer stare, the Essex popstar has switched up her naturally wavy hair for poker straight, super long locks. 
She’s added several inches to her hair with super straight hair extensions, and seems to have gone a slightly darker ginger shade - although that could be the photo’s filter. 
Jesy also donned incredibly dramatic dark, pure black eye makeup; while she’s a fan of the smoky eye and mega lashes, she often uses eyeshadows to give a pop of colour to her lids. Jesy performing in November (Photo: Graham Stone/REX/Shutterstock) Jesy usually favours wavy hair (Photo: Instagram/jesynelson) Pouting up a storm (Photo: Instagram/@littlemix) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
